Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールは今歩いている方向で 本当にいいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you sure we're going to Minal in the direction we're walking?

Entry.JapaneseText: そのはずだが、こう視界が悪くては 確かめようもないな……
Entry.EnglishText: You would think so, but it's hard for me to tell when the visibility is so poor.

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかして、ボクたち、 迷子になっちゃったってコト？
……晴れるまで待つべきか、 それとも……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Then I suppose we could wait until the weather clears up.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待っている余裕はない……！ 早くミナールへ……
Entry.EnglishText: We don't have time to wait around! We need to get to Minal, quickly...

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……もうしばらく歩いてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... Let's keep walking for now.
